thread.title: Spring training is here and this time, the Cleveland Indians actually do have unfinished business
thread.title_full: Spring training is here and this time, the Cleveland Indians actually do have unfinished business

author: Zack Meisel, cleveland.com
title: Spring training is here and this time, the Cleveland Indians actually do have unfinished business
text: They survived for so long and weathered so much and came so close that their clubhouse had been prepped for a champagne bash of unparalleled proportions. If there's a team on the hunt for a second chance, it's this one.
